concept.title: Installation Guide History
concept.shortdesc: This section contains information about changes to the installation documentation in this release.

ul.li: We included the content from Faststart Guide in the Installation documentation. For more information, see .
We created separate installation narratives for and .
Eucalyptus now supports warm upgrades. This means that you do not have to shut down instances before you upgrade Eucalyptus. For more information about upgrading Eucalyptus, see .
